snippet: An American diplomat said that his Egyptian counterparts told him that the United States Embassy was targeted.
abstract: Egyptian security forces arrest three militants with ties to Al Qaeda who were planning terrorist attacks in Egyptian cities and against United States Embassy in Cairo.

byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: An American diplomat said that his Egyptian counterparts told him that the United States Embassy was targeted.

headline.seo: Egypt Arrests 3 in Plot to Attack Cities and an Embassy
headline.main: 3 Arrested in Plot to Bomb Egyptian Cities and Embassy
headline.print_headline: 3 Arrested In Plot to Bomb Egyptian Cities And Embassy
